New-York Historical Society collection of geographic images
Series VI: American Views (includes New York State)
Series VI: American Views (includes New York State)

Series II. American Views is arranged alphabetically by state. Within states, views of cities are also arranged alphabetically. In the boxed views, if five or more views of a city exist, that city received its own folder. Within each city, additional folders were also created for buildings, etc. with five or more views.
